channel.title: Silk Buyer -Paying 1M
channel.description:
Hi,
I was thinking for a little bit, and I came up with an idea. Yes, I read the RHQ guide. A lot of people know that if you goto Alkharid and buy silk from the silk merchant for 3gp each, then you can go to Ardougne and sell that same silk for 60gp each. The only thing is, you can't buy the silk buy the load, if I remember correctly it takes exactly 7 clicks to get one piece of silk. So if you do the math...
7(clicks per silk) * 27(number of inventory slots for silk) = 189(Clicks per load)
So that's 189 clicks per load not including walking to the bank, opening the bank, depositing the silk, closing bank, and then walking back to the silk merchant and starting over.
I think that this is a lot of clicks, even if it is a always sure thing for 57gp proft per silk. I'm currently trying to learn SCAR and SRL scripting so that I can do it myself... but if you were bored and you wanted to try it.. I figured this is a pretty easy script to make. Here's what I was thinking though.
1.) Anti-ban 2.) Anti-random 3.) Different Paths 4.) Full Report
1.) Anti-Ban: Here's what I was thinking for the Anti-Ban features...
1.) Log out because of Mods. 2.) Log out periodically 3.) The usual funtions such as making it seem like you picked up your mouse and put it back down, or hovering over skills, or switching windows. 4.) Messages friends every so often, or says something to passer-byers. 5.) If you can think of any thing else let me know.
Anti-Random: Heres what I was thinking for the Anti-Random features...
1.) Takes screen-shot of all randoms 2.) Logs out for randoms that you cannot solve 3.) Drops all random items 4.) If you can think of anything else let me know.
Different Paths: Heres the ways that things could be different each time. I guess that this is just Anti-Ban extended but it's big enough for it's own section.
1.) Clicks on different spots of the silk seller. 2.) Clicks on different letters on the dialogs. 3.) Clicks on different paths back to the bank (I know that there is only a few ways to go but I guess you could go north or south of the well.) 4.) Go to different bank booths. 5.) Randomly chooses between opening the bank quickly, or going through the dialog process, which is also part of the different letters in the dialog. 6.) If you could think of anything else please let me know.
Full Report: Heres what I was thinking for the report.
1.) Silk bought 2.) Money spent 3.) Profit made 4.) Time spent 5.) If you can think of anything else let me know.
Also a switch between buying them and selling them. Give me a sample run and if i like it then I'll buy it.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 19, 2006, 10:14:55 PM[/size][hr]now im paying

item.title: Silk Buyer -Paying 1M
item.dc:creator: @premier premier
item.description:
@premier wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:12, topic:19490”]Since your SELLING it in ARDOUGNE, I suggest thieving it. There’s some good spots and overall would be SO much more efficient.

While thieving legitly, I often leave my mouse hovering the stall till the silk comes, then immediatly click. My point being, asoon as the silk comes up you have uptext, MUCH more efficient if scar would do this rather than buying it. Also, probally alot less detectable.[/quote]

definatly :]

item.title: Silk Buyer -Paying 1M
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

bb yeh man im still buyin… the reason that im paying so much is cuz i wanted it fast… i mean… i could run this acc with scar on a proxy… and make tons of cash… and its not 5k every 24 hours… it takes like 3 min a load… and its 57 gp profit per piece of silk… 57 * 27 = 1539gp per every three min… and theres 1440 minutes in a day, and so thats 480 trips per day… so 1539 * 480 = 738720gp if i ran it 24/7… 7.4M per day… thats not bad at all =p

Read full topic

item.title: Silk Buyer -Paying 1M
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

Hi,

  I was thinking for a little bit, and I came up with an idea. Yes, I read the RHQ guide. A lot of people know that if you goto Alkharid and buy silk from the silk merchant for 3gp each, then you can go to Ardougne and sell that same silk for 60gp each. The only thing is, you can't buy the silk buy the load, if I remember correctly it takes exactly 7 clicks to get one piece of silk. So if you do the math...

7(clicks per silk) * 27(number of inventory slots for silk) = 189(Clicks per load)

So that’s 189 clicks per load not including walking to the bank, opening the bank, depositing the silk, closing bank, and then walking back to the silk merchant and starting over.

I think that this is a lot of clicks, even if it is a always sure thing for 57gp proft per silk. I’m currently trying to learn SCAR and SRL scripting so that I can do it myself… but if you were bored and you wanted to try it… I figured this is a pretty easy script to make. Here’s what I was thinking though.

1.) Anti-ban
2.) Anti-random
3.) Different Paths
4.) Full Report

1.) Anti-Ban:
Here’s what I was thinking for the Anti-Ban features…

1.) Log out because of Mods.
2.) Log out periodically
3.) The usual funtions such as making it seem like you picked up your mouse and put it back down, or hovering over skills, or switching windows.
4.) Messages friends every so often, or says something to passer-byers.
5.) If you can think of any thing else let me know.

Anti-Random:
Heres what I was thinking for the Anti-Random features…

1.) Takes screen-shot of all randoms
2.) Logs out for randoms that you cannot solve
3.) Drops all random items
4.) If you can think of anything else let me know.

Different Paths:
Heres the ways that things could be different each time. I guess that this is just Anti-Ban extended but it’s big enough for it’s own section.

1.) Clicks on different spots of the silk seller.
2.) Clicks on different letters on the dialogs.
3.) Clicks on different paths back to the bank (I know that there is only a few ways to go but I guess you could go north or south of the well.)
4.) Go to different bank booths.
5.) Randomly chooses between opening the bank quickly, or going through the dialog process, which is also part of the different letters in the dialog.
6.) If you could think of anything else please let me know.

Full Report:
Heres what I was thinking for the report.

1.) Silk bought
2.) Money spent
3.) Profit made
4.) Time spent
5.) If you can think of anything else let me know.

Also a switch between buying them and selling them. Give me a sample run and if i like it then I’ll buy it.[br][size=1]Posted at: October 19, 2006, 10:14:55 PM[/size][hr]now im paying
